panels.description: Number of requests per second made to the gateway by a given origin
panels.title: Requests per Origin / Second

panels.description: Number of 5XX responses returned by the gateway per second
panels.title: 5XX Responses / Second

panels.description: Number of requests per second made to the gateway by endpoint
panels.title: Requests per Endpoint / Second

panels.description: docIds that appeared in the pubsub every 2 minutes
panels.title: Active DocId Count

panels.description: Queries (i.e. message "typ" equals 1 and event is received) in the pubsub topic

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="gateway", job="ceramic/pubsub"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | message_typ=1 and event="received" [$__interval])) by (job)

panels.title: Queries in PubSub Topic

panels.description: Updates (i.e. message "typ" equals 0) in the pubsub topic
panels.title: Updates in PubSub Topic

panels.description: Queries (i.e. message "typ" is 2 and event is published) in the pubsub topic

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="gateway", job="ceramic/pubsub"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | message_typ=2 and event="published" [$__interval])) by (job)

panels.title: Responses in PubSub Topic
